Title: The great project to harness the Huai River
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Producing turbines; railroad workers chipping in; film journalists and artists recording the works for posterity; the Soviet water conservancy expert Bukov who was present at the construction of the Sanhe floodgate, regulating the water level of Hongze Lake, which acts as a reservoir for the Huai river.Bukov ("Bukefu") was also immortalized on this poster from 1951.
